Posts.Content: Mar 20, 2009 02:45PM Twa wrote: Day 3 was the worst for me, on Dose Dense (every 2 weeks) AC. I dozed most of the day and had little appetite. I took Compazine and Lorazepam as needed, and had day 3 of Emend to keep nausea at bay. The day after is often a safe bet ... the steroids give you energy and some appetite.
